Fell right at home, even when you’re away

watch video

Specification

General

Model: JTSXJ01CM
Shape: Spherical Camera
Color: White
Technical Feature: WiFi,Infrared
IP camera performance: Motion
Detection,Night Vision
Connection: Wireless

Network

Protocol: DHCP,HTTP,IPv4,P2P,RTP,TCP,UDP
Wireless: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n

System and Hardware Info

Mobile Access: Android,IOS
Local-storage: Micro SD card up to 32GB
FOV: 100.2 degree

Video Image Audio

Video Resolution: 1080P
Resolution: 1280 x 720,1920 × 1080
Audio Input: Built-in mic.
Audio Output: External speaker

Night Vision

Infrared LED: 10 LEDs

Physical Environment

Exterior Material: Metal
Environment: Indoor
Waterproof: No
Operate Temperature (℃): -10 - 50 Celsius
Degrees

Power

Specification of Power Supply: 5V / 2A

Dimension and Weight

Product weight: 0.2530 kg
Package weight: 0.5990 kg
Product size (L x W x H): 11.80 x 8.00 x 8.00
cm / 4.65 x 3.15 x 3.15 inches
Package size (L x W x H): 10.50 x 9.00 x 16.30
cm / 4.13 x 3.54 x 6.42 inches

Package Contents

Package Contents: 1 x IP Camera, 1 x Power
Cord
